import Img from "../../atoms/Image"; import Button from "../../atoms/Button"; import Icon from "../../atoms/Icon"; import Text from "../../atoms/Text"; const Itemdisplay = (props) => { const { mobId, mobdata, incrFunc } = props; console.log("display", mobId) console.log("displayData", mobdata) const id = mobId - 1 var calcDiscount = ((mobdata[id].actual - mobdata[id].price) / mobdata[id].actual) * 100; var discount = calcDiscount.toFixed(2); var emiCalc = (mobdata[id].price / 6).toFixed(2); //console.log(emiCalc) var buy, delivery,col; if (mobdata[id].available) { buy = "In Stock"; delivery = "Free Delivery Slots Available"; col="green"; } else { buy = "Out Of Stock"; delivery = "Stock Un-Availability check Later"; col="red"; } return (
< Text className={"image-model"} textInput={mobdata[id].model} type={"h1"} />

M.R.P : ₹ {mobdata[id].actual}

Offers and Benifits

) } export default Itemdisplay
